ISSUE.TITLE: Bug in the method GetShipmentTrackerAsync
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Described at https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/94765/bug-in-the-method-getshipmenttrackerasync-in-nop-450 (with the fix) Also related - https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/94751/odd-shipment-error-after-upgrading-44-to-453

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5939 Added some permission checks for the Sales summary report

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6334 Fixed problem with possible null reference exception during getting shipment tracker
